nodes.text: The Malachor Depths were a series of underground passageways and caverns located beneath the surface of Malachor V. Meetra Surik walked the Malachor Depths on her way to the Trayus Academy during the First Jedi Purge. Like the surface, the Malachor Depths contained wreckages of the Battle of Malachor V and was home to storm beasts.
